DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to find the dose of Efavirenz for young children. The safety and how the medication is tolerated will also be studied.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Efavirenz in HIV-Infected Children
DOC.criteria: HIV1 infected; >=3 months of age to <=6 years of age (at time of treatment); screening plasma viral load >=1000 copies/mL Genotypic or phenotypic resistance to EFV, ddl, or FTC/lamivudine (3TC) at screening
